title: ParameterizedTest with MethodSource not working with QuarkusTest
body:
### Describe the bug

Using Quarkus 2.13.0 I have setup a test using code similar to the following:

```java
@QuarkusTest
@TestProfile(MyServiceTest.class)
@ExtendWith(MockitoExtension.class)
public class MyServiceTest implements QuarkusTestProfile {

    @Override
    public Map<String, String> getConfigOverrides() {
        return Map.of(
                "some.param", "a value"
        );
    }

    @InjectMocks
    private MyService myService;

    @Mock
    private AnotherClass otherThing;

    @BeforeEach
    void setUp() {
        MockitoAnnotations.openMocks(this);
    }


    @ParameterizedTest
    @MethodSource("generateTestData")
    @DisplayName("Test that something works")
    void testSomeCode(final Arg1 one, final Arg2 two) throws SomeException {
        when(otherThing.doStuff(eq(one.getId()))).thenReturn(two);

        ExpectedData result = myService.someMethod(one, two);

        assertTrue(result.done());
    }

    private static Stream<Arguments> generateTestData() {
        return Stream.of(
                Arguments.of(
                        Arg1.builder()
                                .id("A1")
                                .type(TYPE_A)
                                .status(Status.ACTIVE)
                                .build(),
                        Arg2.builder()
                                .itemId("A1")
                                .createdAt(Instant.now())
                                .build()
                )
        );
    }

}
```

### Expected behavior

this should run the tests with both args having the values defined in the _generateTestData()_ method

### Actual behavior

it's resulting in the following stack trace:

```
java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: 'boolean org.junit.platform.commons.util.CollectionUtils.isConvertibleToStream(java.lang.Class)'
```

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Linux fedora 5.19.9-200.fc36.x86_64 #1 SMP PREEMPT_DYNAMIC Thu Sep 15 09:49:52 UTC 2022 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
